site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London,Plot 15 Off Parkview Avenue.
description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 8.3 and 28.1 (Construction Environmental Management Plan), Condition 12.1B (Detailed Construction Transport Management Plan), and Condition 12.2 (Construction Worker Travel Plan) of Reserved Matters Approval 21/0070/RMA (as amended by 23/4890/NMA dated 22/12/2023 and 25/0371/NMA dated 28/02/2025) for Plot 15 within the Phase 2 (South) (Plots) sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
